Elon Musk - As the CEO of SpaceX and Tesla, Elon Musk is a visionary entrepreneur who has revolutionized the way we think about space travel and sustainable energy. Swapping places with him would give me unparalleled access to his vast knowledge and expertise in these fields, as well as the opportunity to be a part of groundbreaking projects that are shaping the future of humanity.

Greta Thunberg - As a climate activist, Greta Thunberg has become a global leader in the fight against climate change. Swapping places with her would allow me to experience firsthand the passion and determination of a young person who has dedicated her life to saving the planet. I would gain a deeper understanding of the challenges facing our world and the ways in which we can work together to address them.

David Attenborough - As a renowned naturalist and broadcaster, David Attenborough has spent his career sharing the wonders of the natural world with millions of people around the globe. Swapping places with him would give me the opportunity to experience the world through his eyes, to see the beauty and complexity of the natural world up close and personal, and to learn from his wealth of knowledge and experience.

Malala Yousafzai - As a Nobel Peace Prize laureate and education activist, Malala Yousafzai has dedicated her life to fighting for the rights of girls and women around the world. Swapping places with her would allow me to gain a deeper understanding of the challenges facing women and girls in many parts of the world, and to learn from Malala's remarkable courage and determination.

Stephen Hawking - As a renowned physicist and cosmologist, Stephen Hawking has made groundbreaking contributions to our understanding of the universe. Swapping places with him would give me the opportunity to learn from his vast knowledge and expertise, and to gain a deeper appreciation of the mysteries of the cosmos. I would also be able to experience firsthand the challenges and triumphs of a brilliant mind that has pushed the boundaries of human knowledge.
